strapiPost.title: Upbeat Uptown
strapiPost.content:
There's a killer lineup tonight at Fayetteville Roots' Patio Music Series from 5 - 8p at Woodstone Craft Pizza Uptown.

  • The trio: Jeff Kearney, KillerSugar, and Clare Starr will perform. If you want to get a taste of the music, KUAF had Clare Starr on for an interview. The Patio Series will occur every other Wednesday through July.
  • ICYMI: In addition to its annual festival, Fayetteville Roots is hosting Roots HQ on the Avenue, a concert series that runs Spring through Fall of 2021.

Give Woodstone a call to reserve a table, otherwise, get there early, because tables are first come first served.
